answers.answer: I dono. My second I was 115 and got to 155 and I couldn't believe how big I was. But you gain while pregnant I dono about loosing but good luck

You aren't supposed to diet or anything while pregnant but you can eat very healthy, drink lots of water, cut out pop and juice. . Start walking everyday for Atleast 30 min.  and if you haven't worked out yet then gradually start doing squats, leg work, arm work, and light aerobics. But don't push yourself,  take lots of breaks, drink lots of water and check your heart rate often. You don't want it to go to high. That's what I have been doing my whole pregnancy.  :)

I lost weight my first trimester because I was really sick... Now I'm losing again 3rd trimester 34wks because I have gestational diabetes and I'm on a diet. I wud speak to my doc before trying to lose weight but if u eat healthier (u can see a nutritionist if u want) and excercise (depending on ur fitness and activity level) u will be ok. Walking an swimming are excellent ways to stay fit pregnant!

It's not safe to lose weight during pregnancy.  My first I started at 125 went to 204! walked out of hosptial at 184..then I got Back to 130 and got up to 160 ideograph my seclnd son and this.time I got pregnant right away and was.still 155 and now I'm up to 170 at 20 weeks. So I will not go over 180.

question: Is it possible to lose weight while pregnant?! I started at 132 and im 26 weeks already 160..how?!! I dont know! I feel chubby and not sexy :/ I dont eat a lot,  people say its salt and im retaining water. Thats why I must excercise from here till my due date. See what happens...
title: 26 weeks 0 days
